title: Gett: The Trial of Viviane Amsalem
actors: Ronit Elkabetz, Simon Abkarian, Gabi Amrani, Dalia Beger
plot: In Israel there is neither civil marriage nor civil divorce. Only rabbis can legitimize a marriage or its dissolution. But this dissolution is only possible with full consent from the ...
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 15 wins & 15 nominations.
